page.title: 13Our Churches
page.content: There are two churches in our area.One situated in the Main Street in Gauldry is a small building with seating capacity for 100 people.It was originally a weaving shed and purchased by Mrs.Anstruther Duncan for her estate workers.They came mainly from the Highlands of Scotland and were members of the United Free Church .The other church is in a beautiful woodland setting in Balmerino.This is the original parish church with a capacity of 300 people.In 1938 the United Free Church combined with the Church of Scotland in this parish.The present minister,Mr.Stevenson,conducts a service each Sunday at 10:00 alternating each week between Gauldry and Balmerino.Mr.Stevenson has a "link ed"charge with the Parish of Wormit.He also preaches a sermon in Wormit church each Sunday at 11:30.
